price: ewig darin zu bleiben, und sie werden nicht begehren, davon wegzugehen’.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا لَا يَبۡغُونَ عَنۡهَا حِوَلٗا

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā lā yabghūna ʿanhā ḥiwalan
